item.title: Staff complaining about the amount of illegally parked lorrys and trailers, 18th November
item.description:
5am 9 lorrys and 6 artic trailers parked in car bays staff now complaing that theres nowhere to park and it is a health and saftey issue that singlr women has to walk down a dark alley etc as cannot park at place of work this has been a constant battle in this road there has been a davis trailer unit unhitch on the bend for 5 months now we need a solution and the road clearly signed of the restriction
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hailey Road, Lower Belvedere, Erith, London Borough of Bexley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Near Steps, 18th November
item.description:

item.category: Utility Works and Temporary Traffic Lights

item.title: The pavement was covered with leaves. My colleague and I carshare and she slipped on theleaves getting into the car. Someone did not clean up after their dog and it was unpleasant to say the least. Ihave bagged up two bin bags of leaves and left it under the tree outside 165. This seems to be an annual exercise which we the residents are left with. Grateful if the lbags of eaves are collected., 18th November
item.description:
More effort should be made to clear the pavement of the fallen leaves
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upper Elmers End Road, Elmers End, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet
